statements: SELECT * FROM audit_logs;
SELECT log_id, user_id, action, timestamp FROM audit_logs;
SELECT user_id, action FROM audit_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM audit_logs WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_actions FROM audit_logs GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_actions > 2;
SELECT * FROM audit_logs WHERE user_id = '7851f995-51d1-4d2d-9b5f-66000f545035';
SELECT user_id, action FROM audit_logs WHERE action = 'login';
SELECT log_id, user_id, timestamp FROM audit_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT log_id, user_id, timestamp FROM audit_logs WHERE action = 'update' AND timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp < '2022-02-01';
SELECT DISTINCT action FROM audit_logs ORDER BY action ASC;
SELECT * FROM audit_logs;
SELECT event_description, event_time FROM audit_logs ORDER BY event_time DESC;
SELECT amount, transaction_time FROM transaction_records WHERE amount > 100;
SELECT * FROM transaction_records ORDER BY transaction_id ASC;
SELECT event_description, event_time FROM audit_logs WHERE event_description LIKE '%error%';
SELECT * FROM audit_logs ORDER BY event_time DESC, id ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT event_description FROM audit_logs WHERE id > 100
SELECT event_description, event_time FROM audit_logs WHERE event_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT * FROM transaction_records WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT transaction_time, amount FROM transaction_records WHERE amount <= 500 ORDER BY transaction_time ASC
SELECT * FROM audit_logs;
SELECT user_id, action FROM audit_logs WHERE audit_id = 1;
SELECT details, timestamp FROM audit_logs WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM transaction_records WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT user_id, compliance_type FROM regulatory_compliance ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM audit_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, action FROM audit_logs WHERE user_id = 101 AND action = 'login';
SELECT user_id, timestamp FROM transaction_records WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT compliance_type, details FROM regulatory_compliance WHERE compliance_type LIKE '%GDPR%';
SELECT user_id, status FROM transaction_records WHERE status = 'pending' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM audit_logs;
SELECT log_id, log_date FROM audit_logs ORDER BY log_date DESC;
SELECT log_description FROM audit_logs WHERE log_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM transaction_records WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT organization_name, organization_type FROM organizations WHERE organization_type = 'Finance';
SELECT * FROM audit_logs ORDER BY log_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT log_id, log_description FROM audit_logs WHERE log_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT organization_name AS name, organization_type AS type FROM organizations WHERE organization_type = 'Public';
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, transaction_amount FROM transaction_records WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT report_id, report_date, report_type, organization_name FROM compliance_reports JOIN organizations ON compliance_reports.organization_id = organizations.organization_id;
SELECT * FROM audit_logs LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, action_type FROM audit_logs WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT log_id, user_id, timestamp FROM audit_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM transaction_records WHERE transaction_type = 'Deposit' ORDER BY amount DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT account_number, timestamp FROM transaction_records WHERE amount > 10000;
SELECT * FROM audit_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, action_type FROM audit_logs WHERE action_type = 'login' AND timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, action_type, timestamp FROM audit_logs WHERE user_id = 'a1b2c3d4-1234-5678-90ab-cdef12345678' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT account_number, transaction_type, amount FROM transaction_records WHERE amount > 1000 AND transaction_type = 'deposit';
SELECT report_name, report_date FROM regulatory_reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY report_name ASC;
